templates.name: What Went Well / Could Be Improved
templates.description: The classic retrospective format focusing on positives, improvements, blockers, and actions

templates.name: Mad Sad Glad
templates.description: Express emotions about the sprint - what made you mad, sad, or glad

templates.name: Start Stop Continue
templates.description: Identify practices to start doing, stop doing, and continue doing

templates.name: 4 Ls
templates.description: Liked, Learned, Lacked, and Longed for during the sprint

templates.name: Sailboat
templates.description: Wind (helps us), Anchor (holds us back), Rocks (risks), and Island (goals)

templates.name: Plus Delta
templates.description: What worked well (plus) and what could change (delta)
